name.baseName: 煤炭露天开采;开采煤炭

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: There is no gas disaster and no measured data of methane emission in open-pit coal mine. The mining depth of this kind of coal mine is small, and the gas content of coal seam is also low.
露天煤矿无瓦斯灾害,无甲烷排放的实测数据。该类煤矿开采深度小,煤层瓦斯含量也较低。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Open-pit coal production in 1994 according to China Coal Industry Yearbook statistics. There is no gas disaster and no measured data of methane emission in open-pit coal mine. Considering that the mining depth of this kind of coal mine is small and the gas content of coal seam is low, when estimating the methane emission coefficient, it is taken as half of the methane emission coefficient of the low gas mine in the state-owned key coal mine.
1994年按《中国煤炭工业年鉴》统计的露天煤产量。露天煤矿无瓦斯灾害,无甲烷排放的实测数据。考虑到该类煤矿开采深度小,煤层瓦斯含量也较低, 在估算其甲烷排放系数时,取为全国国有重点煤矿低瓦斯矿井甲烷排放系数的二分之一。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: There is no gas disaster in open-pit coal mine. When estimating the methane emission coefficient, it is taken as half of the methane emission coefficient of low gas mine in state-owned key coal mine.
露天煤矿无瓦斯灾害,在估算其甲烷排放系数时,取为全国国有重点煤矿低瓦斯矿井甲烷排放系数的二分之一。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set describes the process of open-pit coal mining operations in 1994 based on statistics from the China Coal Industry Yearbook. The coal produced from this process is typically used for energy generation, metallurgical processes, or as a raw material for chemical production. Due to the mining characteristics, it is considered to have no gas disasters or significant methane emissions.
该数据集描述了1994年基于《中国煤炭工业年鉴》统计的露天煤矿开采过程。此过程产生的煤炭通常用于发电、冶金过程或作为化工生产的原材料。由于开采特点，认为它没有瓦斯灾害或显著的甲烷排放。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), users should take into account that the estimated methane emission coefficients are specifically tailored for open-pit coal mines with low gas content and no gas disasters. The coefficient is set at half the rate of methane emissions from low gas mines in state-owned key coal mines. Adjustments may be needed for mines with different gas emission profiles. Output flow is primarily methane (CH4).
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，用户应考虑到估算的甲烷排放系数是专门为瓦斯含量低且无瓦斯灾害的露天煤矿量身定做的。该系数设定为国有重点煤矿低瓦斯矿井甲烷排放的一半。对于瓦斯排放特征不同的矿井，可能需要进行调整。输出流以甲烷（CH4）为主。

completeness.common:other: The output flow is dominated by ' CH4 ', and there is no input flow. The input flow of coal mining is more complex, and the literature does not involve such research.
输出流以“CH4”为主，没有输入流，煤炭井工开采输入流较为复杂，文献没有涉及此类研究。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The literature does not explain the amount of coal input. Assume : the amount of coal input : output = 1 : 1.
文献中没有说明煤炭的投入量，假设：煤炭的投入量:产出量=1:1
According to the ' China Coal Industry Yearbook ', the open-pit coal output was 30.81 Mt ( 1994 ).
按《中国煤炭工业年鉴》的露天煤产量30.81 Mt(1994年)。

Methane emissions from open-pit coal mining in 1994 (results from a methane emission factor of 1.59 m3/t *30.81Mt ) ; the original text does not distinguish the flow of bio and fossil, which is judged by experts to be fossil.
1994年露天煤矿开采过程甲烷排放量(甲烷排放系数1.59m3/t*30.81Mt所得结果);原文未区分bio和fossil的流，根据专家判断此处为fossil。
